o:MethodTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_Decompose
o:MethodTargetItem.a:Creator: HarmenWessels
o:MethodTargetItem.a:MethodScript:
Sub %Method%(obj) ' Log that we will start decomposing. WriteInfo "Start decomposing " & obj.Code
' Resolve the decompose.ps1 script location. Dim strDecomposeScriptLocation : strDecomposeScriptLocation = EvaluateNamedPath("%PDC_SCRIPT_PATH%/decompose.ps1") ' For some reason the colon in the file URL is a pipe. So we replace the pipe with colon so the resulting path is correct. Dim strFileLocation : strFileLocation = Replace(Replace(Replace(obj.Location, "file:///", ""), "/", "\"), "|", ":") Dim strDecomposeCommand : strDecomposeCommand = " -File """ & strDecomposeScriptLocation & """ """ & strFileLocation & """" ' Execute the PowerShell command and pipe the output to the script output. Dim strCommandResults : strCommandResults = ExecuteCommand("pwsh.exe", strDecomposeCommand, cmd_PipeOutput)
' Log that we are done. WriteInfo "Done decomposing " & obj.Code End Sub
